resources.string: Happy Valentine Day\! I\'m happy to be in love with u, it\'s the best thing to ever happen to me. I love u<3. This special day is all about being giving thanks, and there is no special person i have to thank. and it\'s you, All my love.
Aloo ayay, how\'s ur dayy\? i hope ur doing fine yaa\!
You are a very kind and perfect person. \nNever listen to the words of those who say \nyou\'re not good and perfect.
you\'re so preciuous to me and everyone. \nDon\'t ever feel like you\'re useless.

I hope u ca become a greater and stronger 
man in the future, 
thank u for being born in the same world 
as me.
